text: And a certain man drew a bow at a venture, and smote the king of Israel between the joints of the harness: wherefore he said unto the driver of his chariot, Turn thine hand, and carry me out of the host; for I am wounded.22.34 at a…: Heb. in his simplicity22.34 joints…: Heb. joints and the breastplate22.34 wounded: Heb. made sick
